short_summary: Purchase Air De-icing-defrosting Fluid from DND Afghanistan
description: Government of Canada intends to purchase deicers fluid (Ethylene Glycol or Propylene Glycol) for use on aircraft.
full_summary:
Aircraft Deicing-Defrosting Fluid Standing Offer Notice #
===========================================================

**Solicitation Number**
------------------------

W8486-249161/B

**Publication Date**
----------------------

2023-09-14

**Tender Closing Date**
-------------------------

2023-11-03T14:00:00

**Notice Type**
----------------

This tender notice invites qualified suppliers to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the supply of Aircraft Deicing-Defrosting Fluid.

**Background**
---------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking a national supplier to supply Aircraft Deicing-Defrosting Fluid to various Canadian Forces Bases across Canada. The fluids are required for aircraft deicing and defrosting purposes.

**Scope of Work**
-------------------

The scope of work involves supplying Aircraft Deicing-Defrosting Fluids that meet the following requirements:

* NSN 6850-20-004-0272 DEICING-DEFROSTING FLUID (or equivalent)
* NSN 6850-20-004-2341 DEICING-DEFROSTING AND ANTI-ICING FLUID (or equivalent)
* NSN 6805-20-A0B-8875 DEICING-DEFROSTING FLUID (or equivalent)

**Technical Requirements**
---------------------------

The supplier must provide fluids that are compatible with one another and can be applied on the same aircraft surface. Type I and Type IV fluids will be accepted as Ethylene Glycol or Propylene Glycol.

**Geographic Deliverables**
---------------------------

The fluids must be delivered to the following regions:

* Quebec (except NCR)
* British Columbia
* Nova Scotia
* Alberta

**Market Notice**
-----------------

This tender notice includes an irrevocable option to purchase Aircraft Deicing-Defrosting Fluid for up to three (3) additional one (1) year period(s) from the date of issuance.

**Eligible Suppliers**
-----------------------

To be eligible to receive this standing offer, suppliers must be able to provide a product or service that meets the requirements outlined in the tender notice. Suppliers must also be able to meet the geographical deliverables requirements and provide fluids that are compatible with one another.

**Tender Submissions**
---------------------

Tender submissions must be submitted in either English or French and may be done online through Canada Buys.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any inquiries or questions, please contact:

* Myriam Zakaib
* Email: my
